members.name: subkey
members.comment: This method will be called to add a subkey into a Sharding Key object being built. The order in which subkey method is called is important as it indicates the order of placement of the subkey within the Sharding Key.

param: subkey - contains the object that needs to be part of shard sub key
subkeyType - sub-key data type of type java.sql.SQLType

members.name: build
members.comment: Returns an instance of the object defined by this builder.

throws: SQLException - If an error occurs building the object

name: java.sql.ShardingKeyBuilder
comment:
A builder created from a DataSource or XADataSource object, used to create a ShardingKey with sub-keys of supported data types. Implementations must support JDBCType.VARCHAR and may also support additional data types.

The following example illustrates the use of ShardingKeyBuilder to create a ShardingKey: 

 

     DataSource ds = new MyDataSource();
     ShardingKey shardingKey = ds.createShardingKeyBuilder()
                           .subkey("abc", JDBCType.VARCHAR)
                           .subkey(94002, JDBCType.INTEGER)
                           .build();
